I would like to have the breakdown of these insurance expenses, shipment by shipment.

 

Thanks,

Manzar

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Manzar Tahir <Manzar.Tahir@puigme.com>; Aswathy Vijayan <Aswathy.Vijayan@chalhoub.com>

BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-13 07:18
Subject: RE: Insurance costs 2024
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Manzar,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Attached is an extract of Puig's import and export data from August 1, 2024, to July 31, 2025, to simulate a 12-month cycle.

 

The marine insurance rates for KSA are 0.116% and 0.09% for the remaining territories. This leads to an estimated premium of $45,000–$46,000 for the full year, combined regionally.

 

Please note that our current insurance policies expire on September 23, 2025. Consequently, the final premium may differ from this estimate based on the actual shipments that occur during the policy period.

 

The Minimum Deposit Premium (MDP) was not recharged to Puig, as it was fully provisioned by the managed companies. As such, once the policy expires, final calculations will be made to correctly account for the insured shipments.

The Minimum Deposit Premium (MDP) was not recharged to Puig, as it was fully provisioned by the managed companies. As such, once the policy expires, final calculations will be made to correctly account for the insured shipments.

 

The attached files include the complete shipment details for imports as well as exports. I trust this provides a clear overview.

 

Please let me know if you require any further assistance.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop
